name: algorand
description: A comprehensive MCP server for tooling interactions (40+) and resource accessibility (60+) plus many useful prompts for interacting with the Algorand blockchain.

NFD_API_KEY.description: API key for the NFD service, required for accessing domain functionalities.
NFD_API_KEY.title: NFD_API_KEY

NFD_API_URL.description: The URL endpoint for the NFD API service.
NFD_API_URL.title: NFD_API_URL

ALGORAND_ALGOD.description: The URL endpoint for the Algorand Algod node.
ALGORAND_ALGOD.title: ALGORAND_ALGOD

ALGORAND_TOKEN.description: The token required to interact with the Algorand Algod node, usually a blank string for testnets.
ALGORAND_TOKEN.title: ALGORAND_TOKEN

ALGORAND_INDEXER.description: The URL endpoint for the Algorand Indexer service.
ALGORAND_INDEXER.title: ALGORAND_INDEXER

ALGORAND_INDEXER_API.description: The API endpoint for accessing Algorand indexer functionalities.
ALGORAND_INDEXER_API.title: ALGORAND_INDEXER_API

ALGORAND_INDEXER_PORT.description: The port for the Algorand indexer service, usually left blank for default settings.
ALGORAND_INDEXER_PORT.title: ALGORAND_INDEXER_PORT

ALGORAND_NETWORK.description: The network type being used (e.g., testnet or mainnet).
ALGORAND_NETWORK.title: ALGORAND_NETWORK
